delete.where: t_keyid = (select t_keyid from dregparm_dbt where t_parentid = (SELECT t_keyid from (select p.t_keyid,SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(p.t_name, '/') Path from dregparm_dbt p connect by prior p.t_keyid=p.t_parentid start with p.t_parentid=0) where Path='/SECUR/BROKER_REPORT') and t_name = 'GENERATED_REPORTS' )

t_keyid = (select t_keyid from dregparm_dbt where t_parentid = (SELECT t_keyid from (select p.t_keyid,SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(p.t_name, '/') Path from dregparm_dbt p connect by prior p.t_keyid=p.t_parentid start with p.t_parentid=0) where Path='/SECUR/BROKER_REPORT') and t_name = 'GENERATED_REPORTS' )
